entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low zero with patchy frost.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 2:35 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High 15 except 7 near the lake.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 15 except 7 near the lake. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 2:35 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 2:35 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
